name: Polar Wave (Mobware Minigame Jam)
description: A short Playdate microgame created for the Mobware Minigame Jam. This is just the source code for the game, it will not be playable without the Mobware framework. The game is based on the WarioWare microgame "The Wave". The player (a polar bear) has to raise or lower the crank to match the incoming wave created by the crowd.
